TITLE Chicken Breasts with Goat Cheese and Sun-Dried Tomatoes

{[Cheese Mix]

# Re-hydrate [2/3 cup sun-dried tomatoes]. Let stand 30 minutes and finely chop.
# Saute [1 cup chopped shallot] with [3 tsp sugar] and [6 cloves garlic, minced] until lightly browned. 
# Place sauted alliums in a bowl and cool.
# Add [1 tbl balsamic vinegar], [1/4 cup basil[, chopped]], [1/2 tsp salt], [4 oz goat cheese] and chopped tommatoes.

}

# Trim [24 oz chicken breast]. Season with [salt] and [pepper].  
# Saute until golden and cooked through. Cover and keep warm.

{[Pan Sauce]
# Deglaze the pan with [3/4 cup chicken broth]. Add [1/4 tsp dried thyme]
# Make a sulry of [2 tsp cornstarch] and [2 tsp water].
